metadata.title: CVE-2016-3861 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: LibUtils in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, 6.x before 2016-09-01, and 7.0 before 2016-09-01 mishandles conversions between Unicode character encodings with different encoding widths, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow) via a crafted file, aka internal bug 29250543.

criterions.comment: android-platform-system-core package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:7.0.0+r1-4').
